content: slip_stitch in next st and stuff leave a tail for in blue yarn sewing round 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 you are going to assemble the head now round 2 4 single_crochet 4 start by cutting a piece of white felt the round 3 single_crochet increase 2x 6 shape of the eyes with blue yarn make a chain long enough to go around the eyes round 4 6 single_crochet 6 see the picture with black yarn round 5 2sc increase 2x 8 embroider a small mouth sew the mouth please note that you do not have the permission to copy sell or redistribute the pattern in any way you have the permission increase 2x 12 round 6 6sc increase 2x 16 round 8 increase 2x 10 single_crochet 14 round 7 7sc increase 2x 18 round 9 6sc increase 2x 16 round 8 8 single_crochet increase 2x 20 round 10 increase 2x 14 single_crochet 18 round 9 9sc increase 2x 22 round 11 2sc increase 6x 24 round 10 10sc increase 2x 24 slip_stitch in next st and stuff leave a tail for round 11 chain 1 turn work 22 single_crochet 22 sewing round 12-13 chain 1 turn work 22 single_crochet 22 round 14 chain 1 turn 8 single_crochet 8 smaller spike body round 15-19 chain 1 turn 8 single_crochet 8 in blue yarn turn your work on the wrong side you should have a foot shape with a trap on round 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 the back like a door single_crochet to start closing the round 2 4 single_crochet 4 trap 8 then single_crochet to close the heel 6 round 3 single_crochet increase 2x 6 fasten_off and turn shoe inside out the wrong side should be on the inside round 4 6 single_crochet 6 round 5 2sc increase 2x 8 round 6 8 single_crochet 8 round 7 3sc increase 2x 10 round 8 10 single_crochet 10 round 9 increase 2x 8 single_crochet 12 round 10 12 single_crochet 12 slip_stitch in next st and stuff leave a tail for sewing legs make two start with red yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 2sc increase 2x 8 round 3 3sc increase 2x 10 round 4 4sc increase 2x 12 please note that you do not have
